name: Snots Quest
description:
Did you ever feel sorry for all the slimes slaughtered by everyone without hesitation?
Well in this game you can finally help them by leading them out of a scary dungeon and giving them back their freedom!

We are very glad we actually got it somewhat finished, because we once again went a little to high with our scope..
The game could definitely use a lot more polish which will probably happen in a post jam version :).

There is controller support as well as two player coop(though both are mostly untested).

Would be great if you try it out!

Made with the Godot Engine, Krita, Musescore and Ardour.

Lodugh - Game Design/Programming
Konsumopfer77 - Graphics
Paul - Music Composing
